statements: SELECT * FROM PatientMedicalRecords WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM PatientMedicalRecords ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender, treatment_plan FROM PatientMedicalRecords WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM PatientMedicalRecords WHERE admission_date >= '2022-01-01' AND admission_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, diagnosis FROM PatientMedicalRecords WHERE patient_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM PatientMedicalRecords WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM PatientMedicalRecords WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, treatment_plan FROM PatientMedicalRecords WHERE admission_date = '2022-09-15' LIMIT 3
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, diagnosis FROM PatientMedicalRecords WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, gender, treatment_plan FROM PatientMedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%' ORDER BY patient_id
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE visit_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT record_id, symptoms, treatment FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis = 'Common Cold';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT patient_id, name, diagnosis FROM Patients INNER JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id WHERE visit_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT diagnosis, COUNT(diagnosis) AS diagnosis_count FROM MedicalRecords GROUP BY diagnosis ORDER BY diagnosis_count DESC
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male' AND diagnosis LIKE '%flu%'
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, age, blood_type FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE record_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT disease_name, symptoms FROM Diseases WHERE disease_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM Patients WHERE blood_type='AB';
SELECT p.patient_id, p.patient_name, m.diagnosis, m.record_date FROM Patients p INNER JOIN MedicalRecords m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id WHERE m.record_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT d.disease_name, d.symptoms, m.diagnosis, p.patient_name FROM Diseases d INNER JOIN MedicalRecords m ON d.disease_id = m.record_id INNER JOIN Patients p ON m.patient_id = p.patient_id ORDER BY p.patient_name ASC, d.disease_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM patients;
SELECT disease_name, disease_description FROM diseases ORDER BY disease_name;
SELECT diagnosis_date, patient_name, disease_name FROM diagnosis JOIN patients ON diagnosis.patient_id = patients.patient_id JOIN diseases ON diagnosis.disease_id = diseases.disease_id;
SELECT test_name, test_result, test_cost FROM medical_tests WHERE test_cost > 1000;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 30;

SELECT diagnosis_date, patients.patient_name, diseases.disease_name, medical_tests.test_name FROM diagnosis JOIN patients ON diagnosis.patient_id = patients.patient_id JOIN diseases ON diagnosis.disease_id = diseases.disease_id JOIN medical_tests ON diagnosis.test_id = medical_tests.test_id;

SELECT patients.patient_name, diseases.disease_name, medical_tests.test_name FROM diagnosis JOIN patients ON diagnosis.patient_id = patients.patient_id JOIN diseases ON diagnosis.disease_id = diseases.disease_id JOIN medical_tests ON diagnosis.test_id = medical_tests.test_id WHERE diseases.disease_name = 'COVID-19';

SELECT patients.patient_name, patients.patient_address, medical_tests.test_name, medical_tests.test_cost FROM diagnosis JOIN patients ON diagnosis.patient_id = patients.patient_id JOIN medical_tests ON diagnosis.test_id = medical_tests.test_id WHERE patients.patient_age > 50 AND medical_tests.test_cost > 1000;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT * FROM medical_history ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT prescription_date, medicine_name FROM prescriptions WHERE dosage = '500mg';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE gender = 'female' AND age < 50;
SELECT medical_history.date, medical_history.doctor_name, patients.patient_name FROM medical_history JOIN patients ON medical_history.patient_id = patients.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM lab_results WHERE result_value > 100 ORDER BY test_date ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT prescriptions.patient_id, prescriptions.medicine_name, prescriptions.dosage, patients.age FROM prescriptions JOIN patients ON prescriptions.patient_id = patients.patient_id WHERE patients.gender = 'male';
